title: Strengthening Manager-Employee Collaboration Competencies through Interactive Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Faculty development program for pre-service/in-service teachers, emphasizing scientific decision-making skills in smartphone-based mobile learning environments, targeting corporate R&D managers

learning_goals: Managers collaborate with employees to design and execute at least two action learning projects for scientific problem-solving.
Learner teams improve work performance and relationship quality by over 20% by applying an action learning process based on mutual feedback.
Participants submit action learning phase outcomes via LMS and mobile environments, achieving a completion rate of over 80%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
